Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Belmont due to earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Belmont due to earlier police activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th ,112 Vincennes/111th buses rrted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th; WB: 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th nr 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
